title: VA - Light My Fire: A Classic Rock Salute To The Doors (2014)
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                  Light My Fire
                        A Classic Rock Salute To The Doors
                                      (2014)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Artists: Various Artists
 Title: Light My Fire: A Classic Rock Salute To The Doors
 Genre: Rock, Blues Rock, Psychedelic Rock, Hard Rock, Acid Rock
 Label: Purple Pyramid Records / Cleopatra Records - CLP1713
 Released: 2014
 Source: CDDA
 Audio Codec: FLAC (.flac)
 Bitrate: lossless 
 Format: image / .cue / log / complete artwork

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Tracklisting:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 [01] - L.A. Woman
        Jimi Jamison (Survivor) - vocals 
        Patrick Moraz (Moody Blues) - keyboards
        Ted Turner (Wishbone Ash) - guitars
        Scott Connor - drums
        Billy Sherwood - bass

        Billy Sherwood - bass

        Billy Sherwood - bass
